text: All this has been achieved through Nato under American leadership. But a big role has been played not only by the British Government but by Right-Wing Labour in this country. They have helped build up Nato and rearm Western Germany, in pursuit of the old familiar anti-Soviet policy which brought disaster in 1939.
handwritten_text: All this has been achieved through Nato under American leadership. But a big role has been played not only by the British Government but by Right-Wing Labour in this country. They have helped build up Nato and rearm Western Germany, in pursuit of the old familiar anti-Soviet policy which brought disaster in 1939.
